# Importing a Data Frame

```{r}

library(readxl)
 
gfg_data=read_excel('Typical_Employee_Survey_Data.xlsx')
 
gfg_data

## Adding header Rows to every column

colnames(Typical_Employee_Survey_Data) <- c("Age", "Gender", "JobSatisfaction", "JobCharacteristic", "WorkExperience", "Promotion", "DecisionMaking", "BudgetaryDecisions", "Proud", "RejectingOtherJobs", "Relations")

## Summary and Box plot for Age

min(Typical_Employee_Survey_Data$Age)
max(Typical_Employee_Survey_Data$Age)
mean(Typical_Employee_Survey_Data$Age)
fivenum(Typical_Employee_Survey_Data$Age)
summary(Typical_Employee_Survey_Data$Age)
boxplot(Typical_Employee_Survey_Data$Age)

## Summary and Box plot for Work Experience

min(Typical_Employee_Survey_Data$WorkExperience)
max(Typical_Employee_Survey_Data$WorkExperience)
mean(Typical_Employee_Survey_Data$WorkExperience)
fivenum(Typical_Employee_Survey_Data$WorkExperience)
summary(Typical_Employee_Survey_Data$WorkExperience)
boxplot(Typical_Employee_Survey_Data$WorkExperience)

```
